decks.notes: This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying efficient creatures and overwhelming the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. The deck contains a mix of creatures with abilities to generate card advantage, pump up the team, and provide some disruption for the opponent. The mana base is designed to ensure smooth and consistent mana production, allowing for the early deployment of threats and maintaining pressure throughout the game. It aims to win through early aggression and efficient use of resources to control the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and card draw. By using cards like Caustic Exhale and Dispelling Exhale to deal with threats, along with Deadly Cover-Up and Strategic Betrayal to control the board, the player aims to outlast their opponent and find their win condition. Consult the Star Charts and Feed the Cycle help the player dig through their deck for key cards, while cards like Marang River Regent and Island+Dragon','','');">Dirgur Island Dragon provide a strong win condition to close out the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and efficiently assemble the necessary combo pieces, such as Omniscience, to overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and creatures. By utilizing cards like Consult the Star Charts and Stock Up to dig through the deck, as well as cards like Uthros, Titanic Godcore and Roiling Dragonstorm to generate massive board presence, this deck aims to establish a dominating position on the battlefield and secure victory through overwhelming force and sheer card advantage.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells, aiming to control the battlefield and deal damage quickly. By efficiently utilizing low-cost creatures and powerful instant spells, the deck seeks to outpace the opponent and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Into the Flood Maw and Fear of Missing Out allows for additional card advantage and pressure on the opponent. This deck thrives on early aggression and efficient card advantage to secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells, counter spells, and card draw. The key strategy is to disrupt your opponent's plans by removing their threats and countering their key spells, while also digging through your deck to find the necessary answers to secure victory. The deck also includes a few win conditions like Marang River Regent and Lightning Helix to close out the game once you have established control. The mana base is focused on providing the necessary colors to cast the spells efficiently.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quick aggression with a mix of control elements. It utilizes cards like Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Phantom Interference and Strategic Betrayal. The deck includes a variety of cheap creatures and spells to maintain a fast pace and outmaneuver opponents. Bitter Triumph and Gloomlake Verge provide additional resources and card advantage, while cards like Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel and Tishana's Tidebinder offer unique abilities to further pressure the opponent.

This deck focuses on creating aggressive plays with a Dimir color combination, utilizing cards that can quickly put pressure on the opponent. By combining efficient creatures like Cecil, Dark Knight and Azure Beastbinder with disruptive spells such as Phantom Interference and Strategic Betrayal, this deck aims to control the battlefield and maintain tempo. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Enduring Curiosity and Spyglass Siren allows for card advantage and flexibility in combat situations. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of fast-paced aggression and strategic disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By combining low-cost creatures with removal spells and hand disruption, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game and apply pressure early on. The Orzhov color combination allows for a mix of efficient creatures and powerful spells, while utilizing the deck's mana base to consistently play threats on curve. The deck also includes a few powerful late-game cards, such as Elspeth, Storm Slayer, to help close out games if they go longer than expected.

This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Burst Lightning, Lightning Strike, and Abrade, along with powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Emberheart Challenger, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. With a well-balanced mix of creatures and burn spells, this Red Deck Wins archetype is designed to apply constant pressure and force the opponent to react defensively, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

This deck focuses on deploying aggressive red creatures and burning spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. It aims to control the board early on with efficient creatures like Hired Claw and Nova Hellkite, while also utilizing direct damage spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to keep the pressure on. By maintaining a fast pace and constantly attacking the opponent, this deck seeks to close out the game before the opponent can stabilize and mount a comeback.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a mix of evasive creatures and disruptive spells. The key strategy lies in using cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner to control the board while creatures like Azure Beastbinder and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares deal damage directly to the opponent. Soulstone Sanctuary helps protect your creatures while Enduring Curiosity and Multiversal Passage provide card advantage and flexibility. With a mix of aggression and control elements, this deck aims to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent using a combination of low-cost burn spells and aggressive creatures. It aims to control the pace of the game by continuously applying pressure and forcing the opponent to react to threats. The deck utilizes powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Burnout Bashtronaut to push through damage while also having access to removal spells like Lightning Strike to deal with opposing threats. With a strong mana base and a mix of direct damage and creature threats, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents and secure a fast victory.

The deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures and utilizing combat tricks to deal damage quickly to the opponent. The key strategy is to maintain board presence with cheap and efficient creatures like Callous Sell-Sword and Emberheart Challenger, while supporting them with cards like Might of the Meek and Turn Inside Out to increase their effectiveness. Slickshot Show-Off and Stadium Headliner provide additional damage output, while Leyline of Resonance helps to maintain card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and relentless assault, finishing them off with powerful finishers like Full Bore and Kellan, Planar Trailblazer.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using a combination of burn spells and fast creatures. The deck aims to control the board early on with removal spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, while also deploying powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Razorkin Needlehead to pressure the opponent and end the game quickly. Cards like Ojer Axonil, Deepest Might and Scalding Viper provide additional reach and utility, while Witchstalker Frenzy and Soulstone Sanctuary help to maintain card advantage and board presence throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive red creatures and burn spells. The deck includes a mix of direct damage spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, alongside powerful creatures like Burnout Bashtronaut and Nova Hellkite. The deck also features cards that can provide additional support or protection, such as Riverpyre Verge and Soulstone Sanctuary. With a low mana curve and a focus on speed, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this Aggro Azorius deck is to utilize cheap creatures and control spells to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. The deck focuses on tempo plays, disrupting the opponent's game plan while consistently developing its own board. Cards like Novice Inspector and Spyglass Siren help generate card advantage and slow down the opponent, while cards like Warden of the Inner Sky and Starfield Shepherd provide powerful threats to close out the game. The deck aims to be proactive and aggressive, punishing opponents who stumble or fall behind.
